question: Countries need to work hard to improve _____ in their poorest areas. Everyone has a right to live in a clean place.
Your drink would be healthier for you if you _____ the amount of sugar you add to it.
If you could _____ some time to help us with our final project, we would really appreciate it.
If you don’t take better care of yourself, you will _____ your health.
She wants me to be perfect in every way, but it’s impossible to live up to that _____.
Getting a high score on the university entrance exam was quite a _____ for her, but she did well.
The politician had some problems after she accepted a large _____ from a well-known criminal.
I’m sorry teacher, but I don’t quite know what this word means. Could you _____ it for me?
I haven’t been sleeping well, and this seems to caused an _____ of pimples on my face.
This country’s _____ has been improving as a result of global trade.
Congratulations! Getting a perfect score on your driver’s test is quite an _____.
I don’t want to _____ the already bad situation with my girlfriend by telling her that I accidentally kissed her twin sister!
Heartbreak is a _____ that most of us will experience at one time or another; it’s part of being human.
You can really help the people of the village if you donate some money to that _____.
I’m sorry to say that there has been another _____ of Covid 19 this month.
I think working overseas would be a wonderful _____ for you.
After the global _____ finished, many countries changed the way that they created medicines.
If you do a little research on the price of a new car, you can make an _____ decision on how much you should pay.
I want to volunteer to help a local _____ this summer. I hope I can do some good for the people of my community.
If you want to _____ your weight, think about exercising more instead of eating less.
Creating a new way to fight certain types of cancer was the doctor’s best-known _____.
What _____ of your salary do you save each month?
We had a very _____ meeting yesterday, and we solved a lot of the problems with our project.
After studying a little bit of English each day, I really noticed that my speaking ability started to _____.
I really studied hard this semester, and it resulted in a _____ improvement in my final grade for the class.
Susan made the largest _____ to the group project by working so hard to make sure that everything was correct in the report.
When there are too many people who can't get jobs, the whole _____ suffers.
I can’t wait to _____ the Northern Lights in Iceland. If you come with me, it would be perfect!
The best thing that a teacher can do is to make sure that his or her students leave school with _____ knowledge in their chosen fields.
If you want to improve your test scores, you should try to _____ your diet. Good nutrition really helps you remember better.
The _____ in the boy’s dormitory is not very good. It is always a little dirty, and it smells quite bad.
One of the most _____ industries of Taiwan is its computer chip manufacturing.
When you _____ something, you try to explain what it means.
The most recent _____ has caused a lot of problems for the world’s economies.
Many people consider kindness to one another to be the highest _____ of humanity.
A lot of people like to _____ in order to help their communities.
Over the last ten years, the _____ of students who leave Taiwan to study for Master’s degrees has been increasing.
My classmates and I are going to Thailand to _____ to teach Chinese this winter.
